title: Rice Wine and Soy Sauce Dressing Recipe
full_text:
Rice Wine and Soy Sauce Dressing Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
8 servings
Makes
1 cup
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
tablespoons
finely grated garlic
2
tablespoons
peeled and finely grated
ginger
1
fresh bird's eye chile
, seeded and chopped
1/4
cup
rice wine vinegar
1/4
cup
light soy sauce
2
tablespoons
grapeseed
or
olive oil
1/4
teaspoon
sesame oil
1 1/2
tablespoons
sugar
Freshly ground black pepper
Directions
Combine the ingredients in a jar and shake well to mix. The vinaigrette will keep in the refrigerator for about a week.
